std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Neeltje Johanna Maria Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 91. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with Neeltje Johanna Maria anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Neeltje Johanna Maria Smith baptism on 3 Nov 1793, daughter of Johannes Smith & Huijbregtje Visser.

std_narrative.citation:
Neeltje, daughter of Johannes Smith & Huijbregtje Visser, was baptised on 3 November 1793. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Neeltje Johanna Maria Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 91. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with Neeltje Johanna Maria anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Neeltje Johanna Maria Smith baptism on 3 Nov 1793, daughter of Johannes Smith & Huijbregtje Visser.
